snippet: Seoul is under pressure to explain how a North Korean soldier scaled three barbed-wire fences without being spotted, then had to knock twice on barracks doors to get attention.
abstract: South Korean government is under pressure to explain how North Korean soldier scaled three barbed-wire fences along one of the world’s most heavily patrolled borders without being detected, and also had to knock twice on South Korean barracks doors to get any attention.
lead_paragraph: Seoul is under pressure to explain how a North Korean soldier scaled three barbed-wire fences without being spotted, then had to knock twice on barracks doors to get attention.

headline.seo: South Korea Is Rattled by Border Guards’ Failure to Spot Defector
headline.main: A Defector Goes Unseen, Embarrassing South Korea
headline.print_headline: A Defector Goes Unseen, Embarrassing South Korea
